title: Who is the most evil champion?
body: There are a lot of bad dudes in the world of League of Legends. And I mean *a lot*. But only one of them can be the *most* evil. Is it Karthus with his army of the dead? Cho'Gath and his desire to consume the world? Teemo with his merciless shrooming? Vote in the poll and comment below!
